title: Stardust Saga Refactor
description: Re-architecting a 2D action game using Godot 4. Modular Entity-Component system and Object Pooling for performance optimization.

title: Dev Productivity Dashboard
description: Full-stack application to manage code snippets. Features JWT auth, MongoDB search, and AWS deployment.

title: Personal Finance Engine
description: Enterprise-grade backend API for budget tracking. Uses Spring Boot for logic and PostgreSQL for ACID-compliant data storage.

title: MIPS Binary Game
description: Low-level assembly game demonstrating computer architecture fundamentals and memory management.
